short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic Ad Skipping: Speed-up and mute video ads to better your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove annoying ads with this minimal ad skipper!

Ad Skipper ensures a clean and distraction-free YouTube experience. It does the bare minimum- no extra bloated features you didn't ask for. This keeps your browser running quickly and prevents your battery from being drained. Support your favorite YouTuber while enjoying what you came for- content, not ads!

✅ Mutes and speeds up ads
✅ Automatically clicks the Skip button for skippable ads
✅ Creators are still paid for your view
✅ No interruptions to your video- a pleasant viewing experience!

Download Ad Skipper and never worry about ads again!
Updates continuously to ensure all ads are skipped.
